name: Moto Bike Racer: 3D Motorbikers Heated Chase Fun
name_original: Moto Bike Racer: 3D Motorbikers Heated Chase Fun
description:
Moto Bike Racer is a fast paced 3D motorcycle bike racing rider game in a top gear speedway beautiful sports track. Race along with other artificial intelligence (AI) bikers for the desired number of laps assisted with back camera view mirror and win!

Enjoy the unlimited addicted fun of 3D extreme motorcycle bike rider racing without free hitting, bumping or fighting with other AI street road racers or warriors. No need to wait for custom laps & bike to win the game. Don’t miss the limited time bike racing promotion offer!!

Race Countdown time is running out..! Start playing now, you be the first person winner and allow second & third places to AI bikers. Have fun!!!
Key features:

* Beautiful 3D graphics of unique race track & bikes
* Choose from 3 fun games - Race & Chase, Countdown & Timer modes
* Challenge AI opponents with nitro fire fx motor sports bike racing
* Turn into Drizzling rain night sprint race rally racing with optional lights on or off or day mode
* Play with new apple tv device remote or game controller pad - tilt,motion,throttle,accelerometer etc
* Picture-in-Picture(PIP) 2D overview track map for continuos free camera feed
* Six different game free camera views including front facing driver (biker) view
* As a bonus, police cop biker comes with different chasing sharp shooting sounds of siren which can be turned off optionally during heated racing game
* Sports bike, dirt bike & police cop bike all in action motorcycle cross bike racing
* Practice with timer & countdown mode to improve person fast bike racing like other auto or car driving skills
* Cool multiple animations of biker for start, stop, backup, nitro hit, reverse, fall & rise etc
